topics.body:
Hmm...not sure if I should get contacts or not.

On one hand, my face looks good with glasses and I feel like I look like shit with contacts on. On the other hand, maybe I'm just not used to my face without contacts.

It would be pretty nice to actually be able to use mascara...

-shut up brother nobody cares-

topics.body:
*Thud*
In Arizona the attorneys in the court case over gay marriage have dusted off a old ass defense for the ban.  Basically Arizona's reason for their gay marriage ban is that they believe that marriage's only reason is for procreation.

Not joking; the way they are now defending the ban is that they want marriage for the sole purpose of procreation.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d2d02f6368725bd2a80100#post_53d2d02f6368725bd2a80100
What about barren women who want to get married?
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d2d08c6368727fd8c80100#post_53d2d08c6368727fd8c80100
And this is why it's so stupid.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d2d02f6368725bd2a80100#post_53d2d02f6368725bd2a80100

They're just shooting in the dark hoping it will stick.

Marriage is now a contract between two people. Procreation comes as a result from that union and even then, _prepetuating the species_ has a wider definition than just that
topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4

topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d2d1ca6368725357590000#post_53d2d1ca6368725357590000
The irony of this is that they shot themselves in the foot thinking it was a good move.

I would not be surprised if it's legalized in Arizona in the next couple of months cause of their stupidity.
